dict.string:
Otis CompassPlus™ destination management system integrates with Lenel OnGuard: building access system to optimize traffic flow and floor access
Building tenants use ID badges for secure access and elevator car assignment to authorized floors
Otis integrates with Lenel OnGuard: building access system and Interlogix TruVision: cameras to dispatch elevators based on crowd size
Offers interior, electronic access control solutions
Provides flexibility and economy with modular or wireless locks in standalone or integrated access systems
Offers interior, electronic access control solutions
Provides flexibility and economy with modular or wireless locks in standalone or integrated access systems
All critical elevator functions are monitored 24/7 by Otis:
Data gathering allows for custom service visits
Identify issues before they become problems
Technicians are dispatched automatically for urgent issues
Gen2 elevators with ReGen™ drives use up to 75% less energy than conventional elevators
Advanced ReGen™ drive technology turns gravity into energy
Small enough to fit inside the wall at top elevator landing
No need to plan extra room at top of hoistway
Much easier access for diagnostics and repair
All critical elevator functions are monitored 24/7 by Otis
Data gathering allows for custom service visits
Identify issues before they become problems
Technicians are dispatched automatically for urgent issues
Gen2: elevators with ReGen™ drives use up to 75% less energy than conventional elevators
Advanced ReGen™ drive technology turns gravity into energy
Doors open quietly and quickly - as fast as 1.4 seconds
Greatly reduced floor-to-floor travel times equals less wait time
Direct drive technology means fewer moving parts and less maintenance
Sleep mode powers down lights and fans when idle
LED lights save energy and last 10 times longer
Coated steel belts create a remarkably smooth ride
New machine is 70% smaller than conventional geared machines
Machine actually fits inside the hoistway, eliminating machine room
Small enough to fit inside the wall at top elevator landing
No need to plan extra room at top of hoistway
Much easier access for diagnostics and repair
Patented Otis SmartGrouping uniquely groups people and stops, significantly reducing waiting and travel times
Integrates with Lenel OnGuard: building access system to optimize traffic flow and floor access
Integrates with Lenel OnGuard building access system and Interlogix TruVision: security cameras to dispatch elevators based on crowd size
Up to 50% Faster Movement Throughout Building
SmartGrouping greatly reduces start/stop peak energy draw
Places elevators in standby mode during light traffic, using 27% less energy than conventional destination dispatching
CompassPlus™ touch screens automatically go into sleep mode during low usage times
Sleep mode slows escalator speed when there are no passengers
ReGen: drive captures created energy, directing it back into building grid
Otis high-efficiency lubrication system uses up to 98% less oil
Otis EMS Panorama: system constantly monitors, controls and gathers information, spotting potential issues
Sleep mode increases life of major mechanical components
Customizable LED lighting allows for seamless integration into building design
Beats industry part load efficiency standards by up to 44%
Tri-rotor design shortens rotor length and increases compression efficiency
Integrates with Automated Logic: plant system manager via WebCTRL: building automation system to optimize chiller plant systems and save energy
Integrates with Automated Logic WebCTRL building automation system to assure comfortable temperature settings at time of occupancy based on building and weather conditions
World’s first integrated, water-cooled, tri-rotor, variable-speed screw chiller
Wide operating envelope handles even the toughest load scenarios
Robust design provides reliable operation under wide range of conditions
Greatly reduced number of moving parts
Hermetic motor operates in refrigerated, clean environment
Unique tri-rotor compressor design eliminates slide valve and reduces bearing loads, resulting in longer operation
Offers efficient filtration options including HEPA filters
Features Agion: antimicrobial-coated steel for improved indoor air quality
Facilitates easy cleaning due to wash-down construction
Has less than 1% leakage at 8 inches of water gauge
i-Vu: Open Control System enables fully integrated native BACnet: building automation system
Choose from 27 varieties to fit most building configurations

Carrier systems integrate with Automated Logic: plant system manager via WebCTRL: building automation system to optimize chiller plant systems and save energy
Carrier systems integrate with Automated Logic WebCTRL building automation system to assure comfortable temperature settings at time of occupancy based on building and weather conditions

Dynamically displays calculations per area, tenant and building
Shows exact hour and minute in which problem occurred for more accurate diagnosis
Showcases property’s energy conservation and sustainability measures
Displays current energy and water usage, reductions in CO2 emissions, and outdoor air conditions
Provides building directions, room schedules, virtual tours, and amenities
